response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. It's not just a product; it's an investment that will serve you well for years to come. Given its value and uniqueness, I propose a price of $950,000 for this opportunity. I believe this offer reflects the product's true worth while providing you with a significant saving. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 950000}
